replies.body:
Yeah, I've heard legends about those mythical creatures called "Urgot mains"
Mom always told to eat my veggies or I get one of those in my next ranked game.

People say these are just superstitions, but my uncle once played with Urgot main. He tried to record the match on replay system but it is mysteriously blurred. He got closed into asylum one month later.
they said the same things about galio mains, too.  except much rarer.

https://media.tenor.com/images/769becdb5ebaee4c4e56670600e03e6b/tenor.gif

This guy was a Galio main.  RIP Galio, you will forever be missed (by me).
urgot mid since s3 baby, funny how the only time i wasnt told im trolling i was told im a meta slaves back when LCS did it... sheeple
There aren't a lot of us

"Urgot mains"
http://s2.quickmeme.com/img/96/966dbb89f86f612fcb58a4dde6385c38df88ba63e170c5c076699b6afd288390.jpg
Nope. But sentence fragments work just fine. ;p

"Urgot mains"
https://goo.gl/images/pOJYuX

> [{quoted}](name=420 grams,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=NQZoYrlO,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-07-08T15:35:50.163+0000)
>
> "Urgot mains"
> https://goo.gl/images/pOJYuX

Ur*god*
I managed to get lvl 7 on him (wasn't hard since im in low elo) but now that everyone is going to be playing him (part of his charm was his low popularity-underdog-ness) i guess i'll need a new main.

Tbh, when the hype has ended, new champions are coming out and reworks as well, I expect Urgot to still be low in popularity.
His playstyle is extremely special (same reason why Aurelion sol, while appealing as a character, has a low playrate) and his visuals of a chemtech driven murder abomination doesn't really appeal to a great audience.

Just like Yorick still has a low playrate after his VGU. There are not many people enjoying the archetype of an undead summoning gravedigger.
How I feel

{{champion:72}} might be your guy, actually having a lot of success with him on my other account in top lane.
just remind your jg that post lv6 it is literally a free kill whenever they want to come claim it, and his cc + consistent damage make dueling champs like fiora and yasuo actually not that bad (you can bait fiora riposte with your E quite easily) and his sticking power is awesome.

I've found a new low popularity god for me personally.
nocturne
I have never had a single game of this guy where i went negative.
I've heard of the elusive Galio mains and Urgot mains, but before all of these reworks had anyone heard of the almost non-existent Yorick mains?
Yeah Yorick probably had the smallest following, I mained him for about a year before he was reworked and i honestly miss the old one just because i cant take the new one as a support.
galio had fewer i thought.  never saw him till i askEd my roommate to play him cause i never saw him.
alot of my friends would play him mid quite a bit before the mage update to counter poeple like malzahar, kassadin, and cassiopia
Where's Prophet of Urgod when you need him?
He has to take the day of to spend the entire day praying to his shrine of urgot
How can he grab a champ with the battlecast skin if both arms are weapons??? me so sad =(
The fear alone of a massive walking tower of metal ramming into a champion causes them to jump over urgot to avoid complete obliteration.

"The floor is new Urgot"
Urgot Mains:
http://i.imgur.com/PTVqTuR.png[/img]
How can you main Urgot, if he isn't even out yet? He's the newest champion after all.
Oh yeah, all 4 of us.
I know both a galio main and an urgot main. @TakoParadox I'm getting you here.
I'm not an Urgot main but I have Mastery 6 on him and I love playing him. I think his rework will also be fun to play.
i use to be a poppy main, then she was reworked...

I used to be a Yorick main, Then he was reworked.....

His new kit just can't function as a support against the more conventional ones
He is a totally different champ now tho :p
80% of them will be spamming their mastery emote after they recast his ult.
their numbers are growing exponentially!
These MS Paint skills make me think how are you not yet hired by Riot.
funny
